movies.title: Fight Club
movies.actors: Edward Norton, Brad Pitt, Meat Loaf, Zach Grenier
movies.plot: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.
movies.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 11 wins & 37 nominations.
movies.production: Art Linson Productions, Fox 2000 Pictures, Taurus Film, New Regency Pictures

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.writer: Stephen King (short story "Rita Hayworth and Shawshank Redemption"), Frank Darabont (screenplay)
movies.actors: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton, William Sadler
movies.plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
movies.awards: Nominated for 7 Oscars. Another 21 wins & 36 nominations.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.actors: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss, Hugo Weaving
movies.plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

movies.title: The Silence of the Lambs
movies.actors: Jodie Foster, Lawrence A. Bonney, Kasi Lemmons, Lawrence T. Wrentz
movies.plot: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

movies.title: Star Trek
movies.writer: Roberto Orci, Alex Kurtzman, Gene Roddenberry (television series "Star Trek")
movies.actors: Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto, Leonard Nimoy, Eric Bana
movies.plot: The brash James T. Kirk tries to live up to his father's legacy with Mr. Spock keeping him in check as a vengeful Romulan from the future creates black holes to destroy the Federation one planet at a time.

movies.title: Army of Darkness
movies.actors: Bruce Campbell, Embeth Davidtz, Marcus Gilbert, Ian Abercrombie
movies.plot: A sardonic hardware store clerk is accidentally transported to 1300 A.D., where he must retrieve the Necronomicon and battle an army of the dead so he can return home.
movies.production: Dino de Laurentiis Corp., Renaissance Pictures

movies.title: Requiem for a Dream
movies.writer: Hubert Selby Jr. (based on the book by), Hubert Selby Jr. (screenplay), Darren Aronofsky (screenplay)
movies.actors: Ellen Burstyn, Jared Leto, Jennifer Connelly, Marlon Wayans
movies.plot: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.
movies.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 35 wins & 69 nominations.
movies.production: Thousand Words, Industry Entertainment, Truth and Soul Pictures, Bandeira Entertainment, Requiem for a Dream LLC, Artisan Entertainment, Protozoa Pictures, Sibling Productions

movies.title: The Nightmare Before Christmas
movies.writer: Tim Burton (story and characters), Michael McDowell (adaptation), Caroline Thompson (screenplay)
movies.actors: Danny Elfman, Chris Sarandon, Catherine O'Hara, William Hickey
movies.plot: Jack Skellington, king of Halloween Town, discovers Christmas Town, but his attempts to bring Christmas to his home causes confusion.
movies.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 7 wins & 16 nominations.

movies.title: Edward Scissorhands
movies.writer: Tim Burton (story), Caroline Thompson (story), Caroline Thompson (screenplay)
movies.actors: Johnny Depp, Winona Ryder, Dianne Wiest, Anthony Michael Hall
movies.plot: An artificial man, who was incompletely constructed and has scissors for hands, leads a solitary life. Then one day, a suburban lady meets him and introduces him to her world.
movies.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 9 wins & 23 nominations.

movies.title: Donnie Darko
movies.actors: Jake Gyllenhaal, Holmes Osborne, Maggie Gyllenhaal, Daveigh Chase
movies.plot: After narrowly escaping a bizarre accident, a troubled teenager is plagued by visions of a man in a large rabbit suit who manipulates him to commit a series of crimes.
movies.production: Gaylord Films, Pandora Cinema, Adam Fields Productions, Flower Films

movies.title: How to Train Your Dragon
movies.writer: William Davies (screenplay by), Dean DeBlois (screenplay by), Chris Sanders (screenplay by), Cressida Cowell (based on the book by), Marc Hyman (collaborating writer)
movies.actors: Jay Baruchel, Gerard Butler, Craig Ferguson, America Ferrera
movies.plot: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.
movies.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 25 wins & 60 nominations.

movies.title: Spirited Away
movies.actors: Rumi Hiiragi, Miyu Irino, Mari Natsuki, Takashi Naitô
movies.plot: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.
movies.production: Walt Disney Pictures, Tokuma Shoten, Studio Ghibli

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.actors: Ellen Burstyn, Matthew McConaughey, Mackenzie Foy, John Lithgow
movies.plot: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: Gone Girl
movies.actors: Ben Affleck, Rosamund Pike, Neil Patrick Harris, Tyler Perry
movies.plot: With his wife's disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it's suspected that he may not be innocent.
movies.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 64 wins & 183 nominations.

movies.title: Big Hero 6
movies.writer: Jordan Roberts (screenplay by), Robert L. Baird (screenplay by), Daniel Gerson (screenplay by), Man of Action (Big Hero 6 team and characters created by), Steven T. Seagle (characters), Duncan Rouleau (characters)
movies.actors: Scott Adsit, Ryan Potter, Daniel Henney, T.J. Miller
movies.plot: The special bond develops between plus-sized inflatable robot Baymax, and prodigy Hiro Hamada. They team up with a group of friends to form a band of high-tech heroes.

movies.title: Edge of Tomorrow
movies.writer: Christopher McQuarrie (screenplay by), Jez Butterworth (screenplay by), John-Henry Butterworth (screenplay by), Hiroshi Sakurazaka (based on the novel "All You Need Is Kill" by)
movies.actors: Tom Cruise, Emily Blunt, Brendan Gleeson, Bill Paxton
movies.plot: A soldier fighting aliens gets to relive the same day over and over again, the day restarting every time he dies.

movies.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
movies.writer: James Gunn, Nicole Perlman, Dan Abnett (based on the Marvel comics by), Andy Lanning (based on the Marvel comics by), Bill Mantlo (character created by: Rocket Raccoon), Keith Giffen (character created by: Rocket Raccoon), Jim Starlin (characters created by: Drax the Destroyer, Gamora & Thanos), Steve Englehart (character created by: Star-Lord), Steve Gan (character created by: Star-Lord), Steve Gerber (character created by: Howard the Duck), Val Mayerik (character created by: Howard the Duck)
movies.actors: Chris Pratt, Zoe Saldana, Dave Bautista, Vin Diesel
movies.plot: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.
movies.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 52 wins & 100 nominations.
movies.production: Marvel Studios, Moving Picture Company, Marvel Enterprises

movies.title: Back to the Future
movies.actors: Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Lea Thompson, Crispin Glover
movies.plot: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the eccentric scientist Doc Brown.
